channel.title: PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN: DEAD MAN'S CHEST UK Podcast
channel.description: PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN: DEAD MAN'S CHEST, an all new epic tale chronicling the further mis-adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, and Elizabeth Swann engage in another rip roaring sea adventure because Jack's life is in danger with supernatural warriors, lead by the legendary Davey Jones -- Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest -- July 7, 2006
channel.itunes:summary: Director: Gore Verbinski Stars: Johnny Depp, Kiera Knightley, Orlando Bloom, Bill Nighy, Mackenzie Crook Certificate: tbc Runtime: tbc min Release date: 06.07.2006 PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN: DEAD MAN'S CHEST, an all new epic tale chronicling the further mis-adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow. Produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and directed by Gore Verbinski from a screenplay written by Ted Elliott & Terry Rossio, Captain Jack sets sail on an all new adventure - filled with more intrigue, more spectacular special effects and more comedy - in July 2006.
channel.itunes:keywords: pirates of the caribbean, pirates 2, pirates, Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
channel.itunes:author: © Buena Vista International (UK) Ltd.

item.title: European Premiere: Leicester Square July 3rd
item.description:
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest - Official UK Web Site
European Premiere: Leicester Square July 3rd
In this exclusive podcast the Jolly Roger is flying at full mast as Captain Jack Sparrow and his shipmates dock at the Odeon Leicester Square. Amidst a sea of loyal fans the cast ‘walk the carpet’ to mark the release of their second heart-thumping epic sea quest - Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man’s Chest. We talk to Hollywood A-listers Johnny Depp, Keira Knightley and Orlando Bloom as well as British favourites Bill Nighy, Jack Davenport and Mackenzie Crook.
Stars: Johnny Depp, Kiera Knightley, Orlando Bloom, Bill Nighy, Mackenzie Crook
Certificate: tbc Runtime: tbc min Release date: 06.07.2006
PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN: DEAD MAN'S CHEST, an all new epic tale chronicling the further mis-adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
Produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and directed by Gore Verbinski from a screenplay written by Ted Elliott & Terry Rossio, Captain Jack sets sail on an all new adventure - filled with more intrigue, more spectacular special effects and more comedy - in July 2006.
item.author: will.johnson@wired.uk.com (© Buena Vista International (UK) Ltd.)
item.itunes:subtitle: European Premiere: Leicester Square July 3rd
item.itunes:summary: In this exclusive podcast the Jolly Roger is flying at full mast as Captain Jack Sparrow and his shipmates dock at the Odeon Leicester Square. Amidst a sea of loyal fans the cast ‘walk the carpet’ to mark the release of their second heart-thumping epic sea quest - Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man’s Chest. We talk to Hollywood A-listers Johnny Depp, Keira Knightley and Orlando Bloom as well as British favourites Bill Nighy, Jack Davenport and Mackenzie Crook.

item.title: Exclusive interviews with Captain Jack Sparrow’s pirate crew (aka MacKenzie Crook & Kevin McNally) onboard The Black Pearl in Portsmouth
item.description:
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest - Official UK Web Site
Exclusive interviews with Captain Jack Sparrow’s pirate crew (aka MacKenzie Crook & Kevin McNally) onboard The Black Pearl in Portsmouth
Actor Mackenzie Crook & Kevin McNally become pirates to join the crew of The Black Pearl competing in The Volvo Ocean Race in Portsmouth
Stars: Johnny Depp, Kiera Knightley, Orlando Bloom, Bill Nighy, Mackenzie Crook
Certificate: tbc Runtime: tbc min Release date: 06.07.2006
PIRATES OF THE CARIBBEAN: DEAD MAN'S CHEST, an all new epic tale chronicling the further mis-adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
